title: Frequency of daily living activities in older adults and their relationship with sociodemographic characteristics: A survey-based study
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Juan Carlos Briede-Westermeyer, Martín Fuentes-Sepúlveda, Francisca Lazo-Sagredo, Alonso Molina-Reyes, Valentina Lagos-Huenuvil, Cristhian Pérez-Villalobos
